about_the_game:
Dive into the life of Ryan, burdened with a massive debt due to his ex-girlfriend's betrayal, who stumbles upon a generous repayment contract from an unexpected encounter with underworld figures. His mission: to become a bartender at the "Night Orchid" bar. Here, he meets the stunning and enigmatic owner, Eirina, and embarks on a journey filled with intrigue and personal discovery.

As a bartender with underworld ties, skillful mixology is just the start. Winning over the bar's mistress and generous female patrons through charm and expertise is key to earning and uncovering the truth behind his ex's betrayal.

Characters







Gameplay:

Manage a bar to earn enough money to repay debts.
Chat with customers and romance female characters.
Rich storyline.
Multiple endings.

content_descriptors.notes: The characters depicted in this game are all adults. It contains explicit adult themes, including female nudity, erotic content, mild violence, alcohol abuse,and non-consensual sexual acts. Please be aware and ensure that you are in an appropriate location before playing to avoid causing distress to others.

name: Bartending Master

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)

short_description: Dive into the life of Ryan, burdened with a massive debt due to his ex-girlfriend's betrayal, who stumbles upon a generous repayment contract from an unexpected encounter with underworld figures. His mission: to become a bartender at the "Night Orchid" bar.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
